sub_title: Shell | Process Technologist | Water Treatment | MSc. TUDelft
summary:
Process Technologist , MSc. graduate from Delft University of Technology with 8+ years of operations and commissioning experience coordinating workforce team of engineers. Specialized in the field of Environmental Engineering Technology specifically water and wastewater treatment design and operations.

I strongly believe that with the recent advancements, vitality of waste water treatment is shifted from merely a treatment mandatory to meet obligatory regulations to lucrative business recovering resources to reuse. I am very curios about developments happening woring the globe. and always looking for opportunities to contribute and add value to the diverse fraternity of engineers through my wide range of experience and knowledge.

projects.title: Research Project: Operated anaerobic digester coupled with AnMBR for removal of Micropollutants (Master Thesis)
projects.description:
• Coupled the micro-aerated lab scale anaerobic digestor with AnMBR optimizing the reactor operation in terms of energy production and achieving better effluent quality.
• Innovative method of micro-aeration applied to investigate the fate of micropollutants in wastewater.

contributors.headline: Shell | Process Technologist | Water Treatment | MSc. TUDelft

projects.title: Designing of an ultra-filtration (UF) plant with detailed costing for Dunea water, Netherlands
projects.description:
•	Proposed a design of an UF plant (DOW membrane SFP 2880XP) with inline coagulation consisting micro-sieves to achieve the required water quality with very low Phosphate concentration (>0.06 mg PO4/l) as the pre-treatment for dune infiltration. 
•	Designed a clarifier-flocculator for the treatment of waste water from UF for reuse, closing the water balance with zero discharge.

contributors.headline: Shell | Process Technologist | Water Treatment | MSc. TUDelft

projects.title: Simulation Projects
projects.description:
Simulation Projects:
•	Performed simulation with BioWin to enhance the performance of advanced biological treatment such as Anammox (ANaerobic AMMonium OXidation), SHARON (Single reactor system for High activity Ammonium Removal Over Nitrite) processes attaining best possible effluent quality.
•	Designed Reverse Osmosis unit using ROSA 9.1 (Reverse Osmosis System Analysis) design software using highest quality DOW FILMTECTM elements available.
•	Simulated the bioreactor to specifically enhance the nitrification process using the Aquasim software as a part of of the course work Environmental microbiology and biotechnology. Analyzed detailed kinetics of microbial growth rate and thermodynamics with simulations.

contributors.headline: Shell | Process Technologist | Water Treatment | MSc. TUDelft

profile_positions.description: Ion exchange(IX) resins from the various plants (such as shell, Yara, DOW, BASF) were analysed based on their intrinsic properties over the entire operational run time using PowerBI as a part of asset management for the evaluation of efficient use of expensive resins under Demin 2030 project. This resins data analysis is used as base for their reuse reducing capital investment significantly required to purchase new expensive IX resins.
profile_positions.title: Summer Intern

profile_positions.description:
Reliance Industries Ltd., Jamnagar (India)					            
Senior Process Engineer (Shift Superintendent)

•	Direct in-charge of Waste Water Treatment Unit as well as utility services as Air Separation Unit (ASU), Desalination, Drinking water & Demineralized water leading the team of subordinates.
•	Real time monitoring & trouble shooting of processes, ensuring nil deviation by keeping them within stipulated operating envelope.
•	Site Incident Controller (SIC) handling emergency situation so as to restore the units back to normalcy.
•	Maintaining effluent parameters within the range, performing the JAR test for the optimization of chemical dosing as well as to treat the sudden upsets in influent receiving from the refinery. 
•	Coordinated the alarm rationalization activities using EXIDA for the plant.
•	Conducting PHA with PHAST and “what if” studies for the upcoming integrations and modifications with existing ETP and audits like energy management, GPRS, work place safety.
•	Implementing PSM (Process Safety Management adopted from Du-Pont) along with the OMS (operating management system) to strengthen the safety culture as well as HRBT (Holistic Risk Based Thinking) to improve the behavior-based safety.
•	Preparing of water balance sheet with daily production reports.
•	Review of basic design documents/shutdown reports prepared by technical department.
•	Complying statutory norms related to discharge of brine into sea for sustainable operation of reverse osmosis and desalination units.
•	Effectively carried out the commissioning of multi effect desalination unit with IDE Israel and WWTP supplied VA Tech Wabag.
profile_positions.title: Senior Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Successfully completing 1 years training and subsequent validation independent charge is given as sift field engineer in Utility section.
•	Gained exposure in operations of Utility ETP specifically and overview of refinery.
•	Performance monitoring of biological treatment aerators, clarifiers, trickling filters, activated carbon filters, reverse osmosis, air dryers, multi-effects desalination unit, Air separation unit, cooling towers, drinking water and DM plant.
•	Done the Factory Acceptance Test (FAT) of passivation and demineralization unit DCS systems.
•	Reviewed PFDs, P&IDs, and involved in desalination unit logic development.
•	Involved in DCS graphics development, logic configuration.
•	Coordinated onsite equipment erection and internals installation, troubleshooting the deviation against the requirement.
•	Developed standard operating procedures for safe and reliable operation of plant.
•	Managed various teams for pre-commissioning and commissioning of various systems in Utilities and ETP under guidance of operation experts
profile_positions.title: Operations Shift Manager

profile_positions.description:
Joined Reliance Industries Limited as Graduate Engineer Trainee and was placed in Utilities and Offsite Complex SEZ refinery, Jamnagar.
•  Exposed to process operations and equipment like distillation columns, heat exchangers, clarifiers, air dryers, compressors, aerators.
•  Trained in field activities under experienced field operators, panel activities under panel officers for daily operations.
•  Got introduced to DCS, ESD and PLC, heavy machinery like compressors, turbines, pumps.
•  Gained knowledge on PFD, P&ID, Heat and Material Balance of the plant, control logics, emergency shut down logics.
•  Trained on Advanced process control for better understanding and execution of panel operations.
•  Trained on Operator Training Simulator (OTS) designed by Yokogawa to have hands on experience on plant operations
profile_positions.title: Graduate Engineering Trainee
